question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. score board
B. pepsi ad board
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The score board is in the foreground, partially obscured by the net, while the Pepsi ad board is further back on the outfield wall, making the depth relationship clear without a depth map.
